I would recommend "The Odyssey" by Homer. This epic poem tells the story of Odysseus, a Greek hero who embarks on a journey home after being expelled from Troy for his role in that war. Along the way, he encounters many obstacles and challenges, but through his wit, courage, and determination, he is able to overcome these obstacles and challenges and continue on his journey home.

The Odyssey is considered one of the greatest works of literature ever written. It was first published in 82 lines in a book called "The Iliad" by Homer. The original manuscript of The Odyssey has been lost.

Another one of the most notable things about American Sniper is how well it portrays the importance of family in times of stress and trauma.
